body: Fam Will there still be a throwback event plez?
body_tagged: Fam Will there still be a throwback event plez?
title: Throwback Event?

replies.body:
As far as I know, there's nothing official planned - unless someone has some big event planned out I'm totally unaware of.

I do plan on being online often enough for the next couple of days and setting maps. I've seen a couple other staff do this as well. If you see me online, send me a message and I'll set whatever throwback map you want :)
